root: ^Everything is going well, but beware, the inquisition will not rest. They will soon discover that you’re still alive, and they will come for you again.
^We should start training our army by fighting neutral monsters around the fortress.

tutorial: ^You can either choose send your minions alone or go out with them.
^Going with them will gratly boost they morale, and you'll be  able to choose their actions.
^Sending them alone is faster but the battles will be harder without you.
go: ^The inquisition will soon learn what mistake they made. This time, things will be different.
^Yes, Master. Nobody will ever forget your name.
